definition: To decrease or diminish in quantity, quality, or value, often used to describe a change in a specific physical or abstract state. It is commonly used to refer to the act of falling off, dropping, or declining, either literally or metaphorically.

examples.german: Die Blätter fallen von den Bäumen.
examples.english: The leaves fall from the trees.

examples.german: Die Temperatur fällt unter den Gefrierpunkt.
examples.english: The temperature drops below freezing point.
The apple falls from the tree.

examples.german: Die Preise fallen während des Ausverkaufs.
examples.english: The prices decrease during the sale.

examples.german: Die Qualität der Produkte fällt ab.
examples.english: The quality of the products deteriorates.
